taskDescription:
Debate proposal: How to envisage a multilingual campus?  A realistic idea would be to plan a two-step process:

 

Step 1: Englishization of the campus as a minor downside of internationalization. This is the current situation for most European campus in the internationalization race.

 

Step 2: Multilingual campus. Turn campuses into diverse and multicultural communities, where different languages are visible: local, EMI and non-local.

[Debate ideas in the group can be summarized in this essay task. Brainstorming of ideas to make different languages visible in the classes, in university services, in research, etc.]
